main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Ogdensberg, New York on December 5-6, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between ten to twenty-five minutes., The object was observed rising and moving west., It was described as bright green and blue, changing brightness and colors from white to orange., The source concluded it was probably a star after investigation., The sighting involved a sailor on watch from the US Coast Guard Cutter 'Maple.'
witness description: sailor on watch, US Coast Guard
